prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, Brass, Strings, Reed, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, Brass, Strings, Reed, but not Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, Brass, Strings, Reed, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, Brass, Strings, Reed, Pipe excluded.
